price: Ambao hawatoi Zaka na wanaikataa Akhera.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ
footnotes: Na washirikina wasio toa Zaka kuwapa wanao stahiki watapata adhabu kali. Na wao tu, si wenginewe, ndio wanao kataa kuwa upo uhai wa Akhera.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: alladhīna lā yu'tūna al-zakata wahum bil-ākhirati hum kāfirūna
